tool_description: Queries regulatory databases to retrieve jurisdiction-specific requirements, guidelines, and approval criteria for clinical trials.

jurisdiction.description: Regulatory jurisdiction (e.g., FDA, EMA, Health Canada, PMDA)

trial_phase.description: Clinical trial phase (Phase I, Phase II, Phase III, Phase IV)

error_messages: Invalid jurisdiction: Provide a recognized regulatory authority (FDA, EMA, Health Canada, PMDA, etc.)
Invalid trial phase: Use Phase I, Phase II, Phase III, or Phase IV
Invalid study type: Use interventional, observational, or expanded_access
Indication not found: The specified therapeutic area is not recognized in regulatory databases
usage: Specify the regulatory jurisdiction, trial phase, and medical indication to retrieve applicable regulatory requirements and guidelines.

requirements.description: List of regulatory requirements for the specified parameters
